summary: A character present for a Redguard female. Enjoy. :)
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]This file is a [i]Nexus exclusive[/i]. If it is found anywhere, including Bethesda.net (as I do have an account there), and is not uploaded by me, it is stolen. Please report any stolen mods you see. :)
[/b][/size]



[img]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/selenameeka/72850_screenshots_20161014123557_1.jpg[/img][size=4][b]


[/b][/size]

[size=3]Hathor was a female Redguard I used to play in Skyrim back in the day. I updated her appearance based on screenshots I had taken (as I no longer have her files) and figured I could share her present with others. [size=3]This mod is free for you to use as a template or to use as your own character's face. [/size]If you like her, please endorse, maybe comment, and enjoy!



[u]Mods used in the screenshots:[/u]

Hair: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSky Hair for Females[/url] (the female specific .esp)
Warpaint: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34539/?]Battle Hardened Warpaint[/url] from set #2 (I think)
Skin: [size=3]Skin: [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/seren4xx/15342092530]SRG Skin[/url] - you can also use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG skin[/url]. Looks good, too. I use SRG's more muscle variant.[/size]
Eyes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
Eyebrows: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Eyebrows[/url]
Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP[/url] (just my preference, she'll work with any body).



[u]Installation:[/u]

[i]Requires Racemenu and SKSE![/i]

1. Open your Data folder in Skyrim
2. Download this file
3. Open Hathor and copy all the files from the data folder to your Skyrim's data folder


[/size]
author: selenameeka
